thread.title_full: 'Complete victory': attorney general celebrates Trump travel ban verdict – video

author: Guardian Staff
title: 'Complete victory': attorney general celebrates Trump travel ban verdict – video
text:
US immigration 'Complete victory': attorney general celebrates Trump travel ban verdict – video 
Washington state attorney general Bob Ferguson hails the unanimous verdict of the ninth US circuit court of appeals in upholding the suspension of Donald Trump’s travel ban , saying it ‘granted everything we sought’. He told the news conference in Seattle: ‘We are a nation a of laws ... those laws apply to everybody and that includes the president of the United States.’ Ferguson singled out the president’s claim that his executive orders were ‘unreviewable’, saying the judges said: ‘There is no precedent to support this claimed unreviewability.’ View more sharing options
